description:
It seems like some of the reviewers here forgot reading the instructions: You have to access the app through your browser. Also: this is the full version. There is no difference between the "full" and the "free" version. You can either use this on a desktop computer locally or as the server install.

Johannes Wilm, the developer

Yes and I really wanted this one to see if it works. But I've tried Software in Ubuntu and 90% of all the apps I've tried since installing 3 days ago., don't open / work! 
I've use Terminal to sudo apt update, and than the Ubuntu / Linux / Software apps! 
IT worked on Parrot OS 4.5 (?) but Parrot stopped working! 
Again. I really needed this, and NO website link in Software manager!
So without a support site, I'd give it it's OK when I get another OS running that works.
summary: using Ubuntu 18.04.3 most apps don't work!

description: A wonderful, simple but powerful semantic editor, with great collaborative features and citation integration. Designed for academics but useful for others too. Stable and (mostly) intuitive and elegant.
summary: Fantastic. Recommend wholeheartedly. Great for academics and others

description:
Difficult for me to install.

Very poor free version, limited funcitonality, in my opinion.

I believe it is not for everyday education user.

This is my opinion only.
Immer wenn ich die webseite aufrufen will kommt das der browser nicht unterstützt wird (die aktuellste version von Firefox)

Nachdem ich das Programm installiert hatte lief mein Rechner permanent auf Volllast.
Seit ich es deinstalliert habe ist wieder Ruhe unter der Tastatur.
summary: Ubuntu läuft mit dem Programm auf Volllast
